name: Journey of Galia_WIP
description:
Small project test, the game project is to guide Blurty a fluffy creature, through the underground to the center of pollution. He is an amazing creature that synthesizes sunlight and pollution into water and energy. The challenges of the first stage are to clear the path of light and consume the debris to clear the path. In this version we use Blurty as an enemy, and we test solar mechanics. We will publish gdd and continue the project after Jam. =)
